content.text: For the episode, see: New Leads.

Michael: The last few weeks things have been changing here. Sabre says it is our duty to support the sales team. And the salesmen are letting it go to their heads. I think it's kind of screwed up. Because the way this place used to work was, make friends first, make sales second, make love, third. In no particular order.
Dwight: Michael you were supposed to tell me when the leads came in!
Michael: Well Bigshot, if you want to find your leads, go to the man who never breeds.
